plot outline: Sally, Dato Zaglol mistress, takes driving lessons at a driving school with Hilmi as the instructor. Hilmi has a girlfriend, Faridah, who works in the same place. Thinking that she is the woman her husband is having affair with, Dato Zaqlol's wife enrolls in the driving school to seduce Hilmi.
